tournament.name: Fuguete Champ 261 - Play Point P/ Top 10

decks.notes: The main concept of this deck revolves around utilizing the Balustrade Spy card to mill the entire deck, while generating mana with cards like Overgrown Battlement and Wall of Roots. This enables players to quickly put their key combo pieces such as Writhing Chrysalis and Sagu Wildling onto the battlefield. The deck also includes cards like Generous Ent and Lead the Stampede to refill the hand after milling through the deck. Ultimately, the goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a powerful board presence and finish them off with a large hit from Lotleth Giant or Troll of Khazad-d√ªm.

The deck focuses on utilizing cheap and efficient creatures and burn spells to apply early pressure on the opponent. It includes cards that can deal direct damage to the opponent, as well as creatures with abilities that trigger whenever artifacts enter the battlefield. The deck also includes cards that can disrupt the opponent's graveyard strategies. Overall, the deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays and burn spells, while also maintaining some flexibility with creature recursion and graveyard disruption.

The deck focuses on utilizing artifact creatures to quickly overwhelm the opponent with a combination of cheap spells and direct damage. It aims to efficiently generate card advantage through artifacts like Ichor Wellspring and Thoughtcast, while also utilizing cards like Galvanic Blast and Krark-Clan Shaman to control the board and deal damage to the opponent. By combining aggressive creatures with powerful artifacts and removal spells, the deck aims to quickly establish dominance on the battlefield and secure a victory through a combination of aggression and control.

The main idea of this Rakdos Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a quick and aggressive onslaught of creatures and burn spells. By efficiently utilizing cheap creatures like Voldaren Epicure and Sneaky Snacker, along with direct damage spells like Lightning Bolt and Fiery Temper, the deck aims to apply constant pressure on the opponent's life total. The inclusion of cards like Vampire's Kiss and Alms of the Vein helps to gain valuable life points to stay ahead in the race. Additionally, the deck includes some treasure generating spells like Grab the Prize and Highway Robbery to provide additional resources for more aggressive plays.

This Jund Aggro deck focuses on utilizing sacrifice effects to power up creatures and control the board. By sacrificing artifacts and creatures with cards like Refurbished Familiar and Fanatical Offering, the deck can trigger abilities like Eviscerator's Insight and Krark-Clan Shaman, dealing direct damage to the opponent. The deck also includes cards like Writhing Chrysalis and Cast Down for removal, as well as cards like Pulse of Murasa for recursion. The mana base includes artifact lands like Drossforge Bridge and utility lands like Bojuka Bog to support the deck's strategy.

The deck focuses on utilizing low-cost creatures with evasion abilities to quickly overwhelm the opponent and control the board. By using counterspells and bounce effects, it aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while maintaining card advantage through drawing cards and tempo advantage through cheap creatures. The inclusion of ninjutsu creatures like Ninja of the Deep Hours allows for additional card draw and surprise attacks, while cards like Humbling Elder provide utility in tapping down threats. Overall, the deck aims to maintain pressure while controlling the pace of the game.

The main concept of this Rakdos Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive playstyle. Utilizing cards like Faithless Looting and Lightning Bolt for card advantage and removal, along with creatures like Sneaky Snacker and Kitchen Imp to pressure the opponent's life total. The deck also includes burn spells like Fiery Temper and Alms of the Vein for additional reach. The inclusion of Highway Robbery and Grab the Prize allows for additional burst damage and card draw. The goal is to quickly close out games before the opponent can stabilize.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive red creatures and burn spells. By playing low-cost, efficient creatures like Goblin Bushwhacker and Gingerbrute, along with direct damage spells like Galvanic Blast and Lightning Bolt, the deck aims to deal damage quickly and efficiently. The inclusion of cards like Rally at the Hornburg and Wrenn's Resolve adds resilience and allows for extra damage output. Overall, this deck is designed to be fast-paced and relentless, aiming to win the game as quickly as possible.

The key concept of this Boros Aggro deck is to have a strong early game presence with low-cost creatures like Novice Inspector and Glint Hawk, while also utilizing efficient removal spells like Galvanic Blast and Journey to Nowhere to control the board. The deck aims to apply pressure quickly and efficiently, using cards like Experimental Synthesizer and Kor Skyfisher to maintain card advantage. Additionally, the deck includes artifact lands like Silverbluff Bridge and Rustvale Bridge to enable additional mana fixing and ramp options.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through counterspells, removal, and card advantage. It utilizes cards like Augur of Bolas and Murmuring Mystic to generate value and creatures like Thorn of the Black Rose for card advantage. It also includes various removal spells like Cast Down and Terminate to deal with threats. The deck aims to control the board and the opponent's resources, using cards like Counterspell and Brainstorm to outmaneuver the opponent. It also includes some versatile cards like Dispel and Unexpected Fangs to further control the battlefield.

This deck focuses on quickly deploying artifact creatures and using artifact synergy to overwhelm the opponent. By using cheap artifact spells and sacrificing artifacts for additional benefits, the deck aims to deal damage quickly and efficiently, while also disrupting the opponent's strategy with cards like Nihil Spellbomb. The deck also utilizes direct damage spells like Galvanic Blast to finish off opponents or clear the way for creatures to attack. The mana base is focused on maximizing artifact synergies while still providing the necessary colors for the spells in the deck.

The main idea of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells to deal damage quickly and efficiently. By using low-cost creatures like Voldaren Epicure and Sneaky Snacker along with burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early in the game. Cards like Fireblast and Fiery Temper provide additional reach to finish off the opponent, while Faithless Looting helps with card selection and Highway Robbery and Grab the Prize provide additional card advantage.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly and aggressively control the game using low-cost creatures and instant spells in order to overwhelm the opponent. By utilizing cards like Delver of Secrets, Cryptic Serpent, and Tolarian Terror, the deck aims to maximize efficiency and disruption through counterspells like Force Spike and Spell Pierce. Additionally, card draw and selection tools like Brainstorm, Thought Scour, and Ponder help maintain consistency and tempo. The inclusion of removal spells like Sleep of the Dead and L√≥rien Revealed provide additional options for controlling the board.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly deal damage to the opponent using aggressive creatures and burn spells. The deck utilizes fast creatures such as Voldaren Epicure and Kitchen Imp along with burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Fiery Temper to whittle down the opponent's life total. Additionally, cards like Grab the Prize and Alms of the Vein provide additional ways to deal damage or gain life. By maintaining pressure and quickly finishing off the opponent, this Rakdos Aggro deck aims to win the game before the opponent can stabilize.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with fast and aggressive creatures, supported by burn spells and life-gain cards. By utilizing low-cost creatures like Voldaren Epicure and Sneaky Snacker, along with removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Fiery Temper, the deck aims to quickly deplete the opponent's life total. Additionally, cards like Faithless Looting and Grab the Prize provide card advantage and mana fixing, while Alms of the Vein and Vampire's Kiss help sustain the player's life total. Overall, the deck aims to maintain pressure and end the game swiftly.

The focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive playstyle using low-cost creatures and burn spells. By efficiently utilizing mana and maximizing damage output, this deck aims to quickly deplete the opponent's life total before they have a chance to stabilize. With a combination of hasty creatures, direct damage spells, and combat tricks, this deck is designed to apply constant pressure and force the opponent to react defensively, ultimately leading to a victorious outcome through relentless aggression.
